item.title: About
item.description:
Iâ€™m a data engineer and specialise in building data pipelines and platforms on Azure.

Outside of my primary work, I occasionally take on small, focused pipeline projects for early-stage teams. These projects are designed to deliver clear, functional results quickly, without long-term commitments or ongoing maintenance.

This site describes that service offering in a simple, transparent way.

item.title: Azure Databricks Ingestion Pipeline
item.description:
Fixed-scope Databricks pipeline build

I offer a single, fixed-scope Databricks ingestion pipeline build for teams using Azure.

Pricing ranges from Â£500â€“Â£750 depending on the complexity of the source system. Small, simple ingestion pipelines are around Â£500; more involved sources can reach Â£750. All work is fixed-scope and delivered within a short window.

Whatâ€™s included

  • One data source (API, database, or files)
  • Ingestion into Azure Data Lake Storage (Gen2)
  • Processing in Databricks
  • Data written to Delta Lake tables
  • A scheduled Databricks job
  • Basic logging and error handling
  • Short handover notes

Whatâ€™s not included

  • Performance tuning or SLA guarantees
  • Cost optimisation
  • Architecture redesign
  • Ongoing support or maintenance
  • Work in regulated financial services environments

Delivery

  • Time required: ~5â€“8 hours total
  • Delivery window: within 7 days of agreement
  • Format: code + brief documentation

A short clarification call may be scheduled to confirm the source complexity and final price.
